description:
Whether you're looking for a way to pass a college class or just get a clear working idea of the who, what , when, where, and how of art I can help you out!

This is a clear concise series of Art History lectures that cover the major works of painting, sculpture, and architecture.  My lecture style is casual and clear.  I don't believe in using a lot of jargon or overcomplicated language.
title: Art History Prehistory to the Renaissance
